alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 2:15PM PST until January 08 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING DOWNGRADED TO WIND ADVISORY WHICH IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST SUNDAY ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory along the base of the Blue Mountains, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning along the base of the Blue Mountains, southeast winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 1 AM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected along the base and slopes of the Blue Mountains. Routes affected include I-84, OR-11, and HWY-395.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
